Name: Delicious Grainfruit Wrap
Desc: A main dish wrapped in big leaves. The light fragrance of Grainfruit rises up from the soft filling within. As it melts in your mouth, its sweet and spicy notes combines with a touch of saltiness, resulting in an incredibly rich taste experience.
Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
